verses.verse: So king <S%H4428><s%> Solomon <S%H8010><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
And these <S%H428><s%> were the princes <S%H8269><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he had; Azariah <S%H5838><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zadok <S%H6659><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%>

Elihoreph <S%H456><s%> and Ahiah, <S%H281><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shisha, <S%H7894><s%> scribes; <S%H5608><s%> Jehoshaphat <S%H3092><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahilud, <S%H286><s%> the recorder. <S%H2142><s%>

And Benaiah <S%H1141><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jehoiada <S%H3077><s%> was over <S%H5921><s%> the host: <S%H6635><s%> and Zadok <S%H6659><s%> and Abiathar <S%H54><s%> were the priests: <S%H3548><s%>

And Azariah <S%H5838><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nathan <S%H5416><s%> was over <S%H5921><s%> the officers: <S%H5324><s%> and Zabud <S%H2071><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nathan <S%H5416><s%> was principal officer, <S%H3548><s%> and the king's <S%H4428><s%> friend: <S%H7463><s%>
And Ahishar <S%H301><s%> was over <S%H5921><s%> the household: <S%H1004><s%> and Adoniram <S%H141><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Abda <S%H5653><s%> was over <S%H5921><s%> the tribute. <S%H4522><s%>

And Solomon <S%H8010><s%> had twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> officers <S%H5324><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> which provided victuals <S%H3557><s%> for <S%H853><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> and his household: <S%H1004><s%> each man <S%H259><s%> his month <S%H2320><s%> in a year <S%H8141><s%> made provision. <S%H3557><s%>
And these <S%H428><s%> are their names: <S%H8034><s%> The son of Hur, <S%H1133><s%> in mount <S%H2022><s%> Ephraim: <S%H669><s%>
The son of Dekar, <S%H1128><s%> in Makaz, <S%H4739><s%> and in Shaalbim, <S%H8169><s%> and Beth-shemesh, <S%H1053><s%> and Elon-beth-hanan: <S%H358><s%>
The son of Hesed, <S%H1136><s%> in Aruboth; <S%H700><s%> to him pertained Sochoh, <S%H7755><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Hepher: <S%H2660><s%>

The son of Abinadab, <S%H1125><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> the region <S%H5299><s%> of Dor; <S%H1756><s%> which had Taphath <S%H2955><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Solomon <S%H8010><s%> to wife: <S%H802><s%>

Baana <S%H1195><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahilud; <S%H286><s%> to him pertained Taanach <S%H8590><s%> and Megiddo, <S%H4023><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> Beth-shean, <S%H1052><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is by <S%H681><s%> Zartanah <S%H6891><s%> beneath <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8478><s%> Jezreel, <S%H3157><s%> from Beth-shean <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1052><s%> to <S%H5704><s%> Abel-meholah, <S%H65><s%> even unto <S%H5704><s%> the place that is beyond <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5676><s%> Jokneam: <S%H3361><s%>

The son of Geber, <S%H1127><s%> in Ramoth-gilead; <S%H7433><s%> to him pertained the towns <S%H2333><s%> of Jair <S%H2971><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> which <S%H834><s%> are in Gilead; <S%H1568><s%> to him also pertained the region <S%H2256><s%> of Argob, <S%H709><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is in Bashan, <S%H1316><s%> threescore <S%H8346><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with walls <S%H2346><s%> and brazen <S%H5178><s%> bars: <S%H1280><s%>
Ahinadab <S%H292><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Iddo <S%H5714><s%> had Mahanaim: <S%H4266><s%>

Ahimaaz <S%H290><s%> was in Naphtali; <S%H5321><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> Basmath <S%H1315><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Solomon <S%H8010><s%> to wife: <S%H802><s%>
Baanah <S%H1195><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hushai <S%H2365><s%> was in Asher <S%H836><s%> and in Aloth: <S%H1175><s%>
Jehoshaphat <S%H3092><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Paruah, <S%H6515><s%> in Issachar: <S%H3485><s%>
Shimei <S%H8096><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Elah, <S%H414><s%> in Benjamin: <S%H1144><s%>

Geber <S%H1398><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Uri <S%H221><s%> was in the country <S%H776><s%> of Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> in the country <S%H776><s%> of Sihon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> and of Og <S%H5747><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Bashan; <S%H1316><s%> and he was the only <S%H259><s%> officer <S%H5333><s%> which <S%H834><s%> was in the land. <S%H776><s%>

Judah <S%H3063><s%> and Israel <S%H3478><s%> were many, <S%H7227><s%> as the sand <S%H2344><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is by <S%H5921><s%> the sea <S%H3220><s%> in multitude, <S%H7230><s%> eating <S%H398><s%> and drinking, <S%H8354><s%> and making merry. <S%H8056><s%>

And Solomon <S%H8010><s%> reigned <S%H4910><s%> over all <S%H3605><s%> kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> the river <S%H5104><s%> unto the land <S%H776><s%> of the Philistines, <S%H6430><s%> and unto <S%H5704><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> of Egypt: <S%H4714><s%> they brought <S%H5066><s%> presents, <S%H4503><s%> and served <S%H5647><s%> <S%H853><s%> Solomon <S%H8010><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of his life. <S%H2416><s%>

And Solomon's <S%H8010><s%> provision <S%H3899><s%> for one <S%H259><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> measures <S%H3734><s%> of fine flour, <S%H5560><s%> and threescore <S%H8346><s%> measures <S%H3734><s%> of meal, <S%H7058><s%>

Ten <S%H6235><s%> fat <S%H1277><s%> oxen, <S%H1241><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> oxen <S%H1241><s%> out of the pastures, <S%H7471><s%> and a hundred <S%H3967><s%> sheep, <S%H6629><s%> beside <S%H905><s%> harts, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H354><s%> and roebucks, <S%H6643><s%> and fallow deer, <S%H3180><s%> and fatted <S%H75><s%> fowl. <S%H1257><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> had dominion <S%H7287><s%> over all <S%H3605><s%> the region on this side <S%H5676><s%> the river, <S%H5104><s%> from Tiphsah <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8607><s%> even to <S%H5704><s%> Azzah, <S%H5804><s%> over all <S%H3605><s%> the kings <S%H4428><s%> on this side <S%H5676><s%> the river: <S%H5104><s%> and he had <S%H1961><s%> peace <S%H7965><s%> on all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> sides <S%H5676><s%> round about <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5439><s%> him.

And Judah <S%H3063><s%> and Israel <S%H3478><s%> dwelt <S%H3427><s%> safely, <S%H983><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> his vine <S%H1612><s%> and under <S%H8478><s%> his fig tree, <S%H8384><s%> from Dan <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1835><s%> even to <S%H5704><s%> Beer-sheba, <S%H884><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of Solomon. <S%H8010><s%>

And Solomon <S%H8010><s%> had <S%H1961><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> stalls <S%H723><s%> of horses <S%H5483><s%> for his chariots, <S%H4817><s%> and twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> horsemen. <S%H6571><s%>

And those <S%H428><s%> officers <S%H5324><s%> provided victual <S%H3557><s%> for <S%H853><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> Solomon, <S%H8010><s%> and for all <S%H3605><s%> that came <S%H7131><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> Solomon's <S%H8010><s%> table, <S%H7979><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> in his month: <S%H2320><s%> they lacked <S%H5737><s%> nothing. <S%H3808><s%> <S%H1697><s%>

Barley <S%H8184><s%> also and straw <S%H8401><s%> for the horses <S%H5483><s%> and dromedaries <S%H7409><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> they unto <S%H413><s%> the place <S%H4725><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> the officers were, <S%H1961><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> according to his charge. <S%H4941><s%>

And God <S%H430><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> Solomon <S%H8010><s%> wisdom <S%H2451><s%> and understanding <S%H8394><s%> exceeding <S%H3966><s%> much, <S%H7235><s%> and largeness <S%H7341><s%> of heart, <S%H3820><s%> even as the sand <S%H2344><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is on <S%H5921><s%> the sea <S%H3220><s%> shore. <S%H8193><s%>

And Solomon's <S%H8010><s%> wisdom <S%H2451><s%> excelled the wisdom <S%H7235><s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2451><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of the east country, <S%H6924><s%> and all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> the wisdom <S%H2451><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

For he was wiser <S%H2449><s%> than all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> men; <S%H120><s%> than Ethan <S%H4480><s%> <S%H387><s%> the Ezrahite, <S%H250><s%> and Heman, <S%H1968><s%> and Chalcol, <S%H3633><s%> and Darda, <S%H1862><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Mahol: <S%H4235><s%> and his fame <S%H8034><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> round about. <S%H5439><s%>
And he spoke <S%H1696><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> proverbs: <S%H4912><s%> and his songs <S%H7892><s%> were <S%H1961><s%> a thousand <S%H505><s%> and five. <S%H2568><s%>

And he spoke <S%H1696><s%> of <S%H5921><s%> trees, <S%H6086><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> the cedar tree <S%H730><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is in Lebanon <S%H3844><s%> even unto <S%H5704><s%> the hyssop <S%H231><s%> that <S%H834><s%> springeth out <S%H3318><s%> of the wall: <S%H7023><s%> he spoke <S%H1696><s%> also of <S%H5921><s%> beasts, <S%H929><s%> and of <S%H5921><s%> fowl, <S%H5775><s%> and of <S%H5921><s%> creeping things, <S%H7431><s%> and of <S%H5921><s%> fishes. <S%H1709><s%>

And there came <S%H935><s%> of all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> to hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H853><s%> the wisdom <S%H2451><s%> of Solomon, <S%H8010><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H854><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> had heard of <S%H8085><s%> <S%H853><s%> his wisdom. <S%H2451><s%>
